property.name: Type
property.value: [sharp, patch, injection, extracellular, multibarrel, multi-electrode-array, tetrode]

property.name: Material
property.definition: The Material the electrodes are made of e.g. glass. tungsten, steel ...

property.name: GlassType
property.definition: The Type of Glass used to pull these electrodes. (e.g. Quartz, Borosilicate)

property.name: GlassSpecification
property.definition: Inner and outer diameter, with or without filament.

property.name: FirePolish
property.definition: Specifies whether or not the electrodes were fire polished.

property.name: Puller
property.definition: The Puller used to make the electrodes.

property.name: PullParameter
property.definition: The specific pull parameters like heat, trip velocity, heat and cooling duration etc..

property.name: ShapeParameters
property.definition: The shape parameters of the electrode.

property.name: Manufacturer
property.definition: The manufacturer of the electrodes if e.g. ordered from a company.

property.name: Coating
property.definition: The coating used to insulate the electrodes.

property.name: ElectrodeCount
property.definition: Number of electrodes in a multi-electrode-array.
